METHOD.NAME: Listar
METHOD.ACTIONSCRIPT: SELECT MAX(V.TRANS_ID) AS TRANS_ID, V.CLIENTE, V.COD_CLIENTE, V.NOME, V.EMAIL, V.CPF_CNPJ FROM (SELECT C.TRANS_ID, C.CLIENTE, C.COD_CLIENTE, C.NOME, C.E_MAIL AS EMAIL, #NULL_TO_S(C.CPF,C.CNPJ) CPF_CNPJ FROM CLIENTES C WHERE C.TRANS_ID>:TRANS_ID UNION SELECT 0 AS TRANS_ID, C.CLIENTE, C.COD_CLIENTE, C.NOME, C.E_MAIL AS EMAIL, #NULL_TO_S(C.CPF,C.CNPJ) CPF_CNPJ FROM CLIENTES C INNER JOIN EBL_ITENS_ERRO E ON E.EBL_CODIGO=C.CLIENTE AND E.EBL_INTEGRACAO=:INTEGRACAO WHERE E.EBL_STATUS="REPROCESSANDO") V GROUP BY V.CLIENTE,V.COD_CLIENTE,V.NOME,V.EMAIL,V.CPF_CNPJ ORDER BY MAX(V.TRANS_ID)
